articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: New poll shows Biden with wide lead among black voters
articles.description: A new poll from The Washington Post and Ipsos aimed at Democratic-leaning black voters shows former Vice President Joe Biden with a significant lead over other candidates, with 48% of black voters expressing a preference for him as a candidate. Senator Bernie…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Rep. Lee: Trump is selling our soldiers as mercenaries, he 'does not deserve to be the commander in chief'
articles.description: Rep. Barbara Lee joins Joy Reid to discuss President Donald Trump's recent interview with Laura Ingraham where the president boasted about sending troops to Saudi Arabia in exchange for "$1 billion in the bank."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Foreign policy analyst: United States only cares 'about human rights violations when the enemy commits them'
articles.description: Rula Jebreal, foreign policy analyst and visiting professor at the University of Miami, joins Joy Reid to discuss the Trump administration's recent actions in Iran and how it pertains to other nations in the Middle East, such as Saudi Arabia.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Black police officers in South Bend say Buttigieg never addressed racial issues when he was mayor
articles.description: The Root's Michael Harriot discusses his reporting on the South Bend police department, where black police officers say complaints about racial issues were not addressed under Pete Buttigieg.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: ‘Art of the Deal’ co-author: Everyone feels the ‘contagious’ anxiety Trump spreads
articles.description: Tony Schwartz, co-author of Pres. Trump's 1987 book 'Art of the Deal',joins Joy Reid to discuss a poll from the American Psychiatry Association that Americans are more anxious this year. Schwartz says that Pres. Trump's anxiety is "contagious" and is felt by …

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Warren ‘disappointed’ Sanders is trashing her on campaign trail
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren has been taking some attacks from fellow Sen. Bernie Sanders’ campaign. Warren said she is “disappointed” he is “sending volunteers out to trash me” on the campaign trail.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 4 Iraqi soldiers injured, no US injuries after 8 rockets hit Iraqi air base
articles.description:
8 rockets hit Iraq's Balad Air Base, Iraqi military spokesperson tells NBC News. 4 Iraqi soldiers were injured. No US soldiers were injured or killed in the attack.

NBC's Chief Foreign Correspondent Richard Engel joins Alex Witt to discuss the situation so f…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'We have confidence in our case': Pelosi says House Dems will vote on delivering of impeachment articles
articles.description: Speaker Nancy Pelosi made a rare appearance on the Sunday talk shows and said that her caucus would be voting this week on whether or nto send
articles.content: Pelosi says no regrets about holding onto impeachment articles, suggests Trump could face more

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Esper says he ‘didn’t see’ proof backing Trump’s claim that Iran was preparing to strike 4 embassies
articles.description: Defense Secretary Mark Esper says he "didn't see" specific evidence that Iran was readying to attack 4 US embassies, as President Donald Trump claimed last week, though Esper says he shares Trump's view that such an attack was "probably" in the works.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sec. Esper says he 'didn't see' evidence supporting Trump's claim that Iran was preparing to attack four US embassies
articles.description: Defense Secretary Mark Esper says he "didn't see" specific evidence that Iran was readying to attack 4 US embassies, as President Donald Trump claimed last week, though Esper says he shares Trump's view that such an attack was "probably" in the works.
